QuestData.Title: The Eye of the Jailer
QuestData.Description:
<The air around you stands still. A chill of domination suffuses your being. You hear a voice.>
Yes... I remember you...
Do you think that because you evaded my grasp once, that I would let it happen again?
No. The Maw answers to me. All that befalls you here will be because I willed it so.
Death comes for you, mortal. Everywhere you go, my eye is upon you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Ve'nari about what you just heard.
